= Tables Test

== Simple Table

|===
|Header 1 |Header 2 |Header 3

|Cell 1
|Cell 2
|Cell 3

|Cell 4
|Cell 5
|Cell 6
|===

== Table with Alignment

[cols="<,^,>"]
|===
|Left |Center |Right

|A
|B
|C
|===

== Table without Header

[%noheader]
|===
|Row 1 Col 1 |Row 1 Col 2
|Row 2 Col 1 |Row 2 Col 2
|===
